description:
355 is a student project made as part of a prototyping course. It was developed by a four person team in two weeks.

In 355, you -- an exhausted, anxious student -- have to complete an essay before the deadline. There's only one problem: you've been typing for so long, all the letters look like gibberish! Try to keep up with a frantic barrage of random characters and type as much as possible before you pass out.

Team Members

  • Gabe Abernathy: Programming
  • Alex Chapman: Design & Production
  • Morgan Harrell: Design & Programming
  • Matt Lalas: Art & Sound
